pkgmetadata.longdescription: See a Forest for the Trees // Getting insight into a forest of classification trees, by calculating similarities between the trees, and subsequently clustering them. Each cluster is represented by it's most central cluster member. The package implements the methodology described in Sies Van Mechelen (2020). Sies, A., Van Mechelen, I. (2020). C443: A methodology to see a forest for the trees. Journal of Classification. doi:10.1007/s00357-019-09350-4.
